name: Video game teacher simulator [ULTIMATE EDITION]
description:
Hello, welcome to this wonderful simulator where you will become a teacher who has to grade his students' projects but there is a problem... It doesn't go as planned. Your class of student is awful, disrespectful and strangely, nothing works? Hope it doesn't bother you too much....

This is our game for our Interpromo gamejam in our school i hope you'll like the game we had so much fun creating this.

Theme : "This is fine" from KC Green's 2013

Constraints : Shrek 2, One input only, frogs, doing playtest during the jam and mobile game.

TEAM : 

Akunix#9952 : Game designer, Graphist, Sound Designer

Aerin#9397 : Lead Graphist

Nikaiaa#1801 : Programmer, Graphist

Le Renard#8133 : Programmer

ШрекСинж#7070 : Lead Programmer
